verses.verse: Now the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> had<WH1961> a very<WH3966> great<WH6099> multitude<WH7227> of cattle:<WH4735> and when they saw<WH7200> the land<WH776> of Jazer,<WH3270> and the land<WH776> of Gilead,<WH1568> that, behold,<WH2009> the place<WH4725> was a place<WH4725> for cattle;<WH4735>

The children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> came<WH935> and spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> and to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and to the princes<WH5387> of the congregation,<WH5712> saying,<WH559>
Ataroth,<WH5852> and Dibon,<WH1769> and Jazer,<WH3270> and Nimrah,<WH5247> and Heshbon,<WH2809> and Elealeh,<WH500> and Shebam,<WH7643> and Nebo,<WH5015> and Beon,<WH1194>

Even the country<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> smote<WH5221> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> of Israel,<WH3478> is a land<WH776> for cattle,<WH4735> and your servants<WH5650> have cattle:<WH4735>

Why, said<WH559> they, if<WH518> we have found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in your sight,<WH5869> let this<WH2063> land<WH776> be given<WH5414> to your servants<WH5650> for a possession,<WH272> and bring<WH5674> us not over<WH5674> Jordan.<WH3383>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and to the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> Shall your brothers<WH251> go<WH935> to war,<WH4421> and shall you sit<WH3427> here?<WH6311>

And why<WH4100> discourage<WH5106> you the heart<WH3820> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from going<WH5674> over<WH5674> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has given<WH5414> them?
Thus<WH3541> did<WH6213> your fathers,<WH1> when I sent<WH7971> them from Kadeshbarnea<WH6947> to see<WH7200> the land.<WH776>

For when they went<WH5927> up to the valley<WH5158> of Eshcol,<WH812> and saw<WH7200> the land,<WH776> they discouraged<WH5106> the heart<WH3820> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they should not go<WH935> into<WH413> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had given<WH5414> them.
And the LORD's<WH3068> anger<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> the same<WH1931> time,<WH3117> and he swore,<WH7650> saying,<WH559>

Surely<WH518> none of the men<WH582> that came<WH5927> up out of Egypt,<WH4714> from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward,<WH4605> shall see<WH7200> the land<WH127> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> to Abraham,<WH85> to Isaac,<WH3327> and to Jacob;<WH3290> because<WH3588> they have not wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> me:

Save<WH3588> <WH518> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenezite,<WH7074> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun:<WH5126> for they have wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD.<WH3068>

And the LORD's<WH3068> anger<WH639> was kindled against Israel,<WH3478> and he made them wander<WH5128> in the wilderness<WH4057> forty<WH705> years,<WH8141> until<WH5704> all<WH3605> the generation,<WH1755> that had done<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD,<WH3068> was consumed.<WH8552>

And, behold,<WH2009> you are risen<WH6965> up in your fathers'<WH1> stead,<WH8478> an increase<WH8635> of sinful<WH2400> men,<WH582> to augment<WH5595> yet<WH5750> the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of the LORD<WH3068> toward<WH413> Israel.<WH3478>

For if you turn<WH7725> away from after<WH310> him, he will yet<WH5750> again<WH3254> leave<WH5117> them in the wilderness;<WH4057> and you shall destroy<WH7843> all<WH3605> this<WH2088> people.<WH5971>
And they came<WH5066> near<WH5066> to him, and said,<WH559> We will build<WH1129> sheepfolds<WH1488> <WH6629> here<WH6311> for our cattle,<WH4735> and cities<WH5892> for our little<WH2945> ones:

But we ourselves<WH587> will go ready<WH2363> armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> until<WH5704> we have brought<WH935> them to their place:<WH4725> and our little<WH2945> ones shall dwell<WH3427> in the fenced<WH4013> cities<WH5892> because<WH6440> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land.<WH776>
We will not return<WH7725> to our houses,<WH1004> until<WH5704> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> have inherited<WH5157> every man<WH376> his inheritance.<WH5159>

For we will not inherit<WH5157> with them on<WH5921> yonder<WH5676> side<WH5676> Jordan,<WH3383> or forward;<WH1973> because<WH3588> our inheritance<WH5159> is fallen<WH935> to us on<WH5921> this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> eastward.<WH4217>
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, If<WH518> you will do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing,<WH1697> if<WH518> you will go armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> to war,<WH4421>
And will go<WH5674> all<WH3605> of you armed<WH2502> over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> until<WH5704> he has driven<WH3423> out his enemies<WH341> from before<WH6440> him,

And the land<WH776> be subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> then afterward<WH310> you shall return,<WH7725> and be guiltless<WH5355> before the LORD,<WH3068> and before Israel;<WH3478> and this<WH2063> land<WH776> shall be your possession<WH272> before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068>
But if<WH518> you will not do<WH6213> so,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> you have sinned<WH2398> against the LORD:<WH3068> and be sure<WH3045> your sin<WH2403> will find<WH4672> you out.
Build<WH1129> you cities<WH5892> for your little<WH2945> ones, and folds<WH1448> for your sheep;<WH6792> and do<WH6213> that which has proceeded<WH3318> out of your mouth.<WH6310>

And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> spoke<WH559> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559> Your servants<WH5650> will do<WH6213> as my lord<WH113> commands.<WH6680>
Our little<WH2945> ones, our wives,<WH802> our flocks,<WH4735> and all<WH3605> our cattle,<WH929> shall be there<WH8033> in the cities<WH5892> of Gilead:<WH1568>
But your servants<WH5650> will pass<WH5674> over,<WH5674> every<WH3605> man armed<WH2502> for war,<WH6635> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> to battle,<WH4421> as my lord<WH113> said.<WH1696>

So concerning them Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and the chief<WH7218> fathers<WH1> of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel:<WH3478>

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, If<WH518> the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> will pass<WH5674> with you over<WH5674> Jordan,<WH3383> every<WH3605> man armed<WH2502> to battle,<WH4421> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and the land<WH776> shall be subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> you; then you shall give<WH5414> them the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> for a possession:<WH272>
But if<WH518> they will not pass<WH5674> over<WH5674> with you armed,<WH2502> they shall have<WH270> possessions<WH270> among<WH8432> you in the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667>

And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> answered,<WH6030> saying,<WH559> As the LORD<WH3068> has said<WH1696> to your servants,<WH5650> so<WH3651> will we do.<WH6213>

We will pass<WH5674> over<WH5674> armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> into the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> that the possession<WH272> of our inheritance<WH5159> on<WH5921> this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> may be ours.

And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> to them, even to the children<WH1121> of Gad,<WH1410> and to the children<WH1121> of Reuben,<WH7205> and to half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> the kingdom<WH4467> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> and the kingdom<WH4467> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> the land,<WH776> with the cities<WH5892> thereof in the coasts,<WH1367> even the cities<WH5892> of the country<WH776> round<WH5439> about.
And the children<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> built<WH1129> Dibon,<WH1769> and Ataroth,<WH5852> and Aroer,<WH6177>
And Atroth,<WH5855> Shophan,<WH5855> and Jaazer,<WH3270> and Jogbehah,<WH3011>
And Bethnimrah,<WH1039> and Bethharan,<WH1028> fenced<WH4013> cities:<WH5892> and folds<WH1448> for sheep.<WH6629>
And the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> built<WH1129> Heshbon,<WH2809> and Elealeh,<WH500> and Kirjathaim,<WH7156>
And Nebo,<WH5015> and Baalmeon,<WH1186> (their names<WH8034> being changed,<WH5437>) and Shibmah:<WH7643> and gave<WH7121> other names<WH8034> to the cities<WH5892> which<WH834> they built.<WH1129>
And the children<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH3212> to Gilead,<WH1568> and took<WH3920> it, and dispossessed<WH3423> the Amorite<WH567> which<WH834> was in it.
And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> Gilead<WH1568> to Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh;<WH4519> and he dwelled<WH3427> therein.
And Jair<WH2971> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> the small towns<WH2333> thereof, and called<WH7121> them Havothjair.<WH2334>
And Nobah<WH5025> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> Kenath,<WH7079> and the villages<WH1323> thereof, and called<WH7121> it Nobah,<WH5025> after his own name.<WH8034>
